system.novice: Navigator makes Opposed Willpower Test vs all living beings looking into their Warp eye (Navigator tests once, all others compare to it). Targets that fail take 1d10 + Navigator's Willpower Bonus damage Energy damage that ignores Armour and Toughness and are stunned for 1 round. Navigator suffers 1 Fatigue, +2 per Degree of Failiure on test. Non-living, Untouchable, or Daemonic/Warp targets are immune. Forewarned/Unaware targets have +30 on Roll to resist.
system.adept: Damage increases to 2d10 + WP Bonus, targets are stunned for 1d5 Rounds and suffer 1d5 Insanity Points.
system.master: Added effect that any target with 20+ Intelligence that suffers damage from this power also makes -10 Toughness Test or instantly dies.  Insanity damage dealt increased to 1d10 from 1d5.
